embeds.description:
:pushpin: **(1) Please follow both the Discord Community Guidelines and the Discord Terms of Service at all times. These can be found here:**
https://discord.com/guidelines
https://discord.com/terms

:pushpin: **(2) Please remain civil and respectful at all times. Discriminatory language against anyone on the basis of race, gender, sexuality or any other characteristic is not allowed, and slurs of any kind will not be tolerated.**

:pushpin: **(3) Please do not post any non work-safe images or content, and ensure any media containing jump scares, excessively loud audio or similar are clearly tagged as such. In addition, posting anything which aims to cause unwanted behaviour on others' devices, such as videos which cause the Discord client to freeze or crash, is strictly forbidden.**

:pushpin: **(4) Please refrain from trolling and baiting, and avoid topics which may be sensitive or inflammatory such as politics.**

:pushpin: **(5) Please keep alternate languages to a minimum. English is the common language shared by both our community and our staff.**

:pushpin: **(6) Please do not spam or attempt to flood any channels. Spam includes nonsensical or off-topic posts, posting memes outside of the proper channel, and chaining emojis.**

:pushpin: **(7) Please ensure your profile picture, banner and nickname is work-safe and does not contain anything which violates our rules.**

:pushpin: **(8) Please keep roleplaying and excessive flirting to more appropriate places.**

:pushpin: **(9) Please use Discord's native `||spoiler text||` function when discussing anything that may be considered spoiler material.**

:pushpin: **(10) Please refrain from unsolicited advertising. This includes things such as links to other Discord servers, and personal Twitch or YouTube channels. If you wish to affiliate with the server, or post something which may fall under this category, please speak with a staff member.**

**You must follow these rules at all times; it is your responsibility to ensure your conduct is in accordance with our rules, and you are responsible for any messages or media you post within our server. 

Please don't attempt to seek out loopholes - the staff team reserves the right to take any action we deem necessary to keep the server running smoothly. If you see anything which requires the attention of a member of staff, please let us know either via DMs or, if immediate action is required, by pinging the <@&727293343352225858> role.

These rules may be changed at any time without prior warning. For an extended version of these rules, please** [click here.](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WX5p0lpnGK-jpWl10W7ejKI-EjN6h475mHdL6R5AHys/)

__**NEW MEMBERS**__
_In order to access the rest of the server, please use the ||?snacks|| command in <#870793554916679720>_.

**Server Administrators:** <@&727293343352225859>
**Server Moderators:** <@&727293343352225858>
**Server Boosters:** <@&727328848584114219>
**Event Organisers:** <@&731996867063316480>
**Contributors:** <@&746539577321324544>

__**Roles obtainable through activity:**__
**Level 50** <@&844502056311980032>
**Level 40** <@&844502060606816268>
**Level 30 ** <@&844502064378019840>
**Level 20** <@&844502067896385566>
**Level 15** <@&844502071340302386>
**Level 10** <@&844502074846216231>
**Level 5** <@&844502078194057248>
**Level 1** <@&845822922932748328>

**Level 1** will allow you to post images and embed URLs in most content channels. **Level 5** will allow you to do so in all channels. In addition, **level 1** will allow you to speak and stream in voice channels!

Roles for your favourite characters, notifications for events and giveaways and pronouns can all be obtained by **clicking on the corresponding react emotes** in <#727293344136560782>!

Custom vanity roles are also given away as prizes for competitions and giveaways!

:diamond_shape_with_a_dot_inside: **Custom Vanity Roles**
Boosters will be given their own personal vanity role with a name and colour of their choice for as long as the boost persists! Speak to a member of staff to get started. **The staff team reserves the right to reject any role names which are inappropriate or in violation of our rules.**

:diamond_shape_with_a_dot_inside: **Greater Chat XP**
Boosters will also level up faster as they chat in the server!

**Enjoy your time here at the K-ON Community Discord Server!**

Please read everything above and make sure you are familiar with everything regarding our server! If you have any queries at all, feel free to ask a member of staff - either in chat, or in DMs!

**Vanity URL:** http://discord.gg/kon
**Permanent Link:** http://discord.gg/NsJ6S3W
**K-ON Subreddit:** https://www.reddit.com/r/k_on/
**K-ON Wiki:** http://k-on.fandom.com/
**Server Wiki:** http://koncord.fandom.com/
